column1: Uncontrolled data used in OS command
column2: Using user-supplied data in an OS command, without neutralizing special elements, can make code vulnerable to command injection.
column4: This argument to an OS command is derived from [["user input (string read by fgets)"|"relative:///main.c:29:15:29:21"]], dangerously concatenated into [["snprintf output argument"|"relative:///main.c:35:18:35:28"]], and then passed to execute_ftp_command(command), which calls system(__command).
